title: I’m Counting on You
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>It’s rare for you to ask me something, Nozomi-san. Maru hopes Maru can be of help to you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, I really wanted to ask you for a favor, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>What an immense responsibility zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahaha, don’t be that discouraged. You see, recently, it’s been raining non-stop because of the rainy season, right? So I’ve been thinking that I kind of want to read at home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>So I’d like to know what books you recommend, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru sees, so that’s why you asked me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, you read a lot of books, don’t you, Hanamaru-chan? I kind of want to try reading the books you’ve read. What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Leave it to me zura! Maru has a lot of book recommendations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s great, then, will you go together with me to a bookstore after practice? I’ll treat you to some ice cream after we buy the books as thanks♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Waah, Maru looks forward to going out with you zura, Nozomi-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
